title: Darksiders Diluogy RePack By R.G Mechanics NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:
Year of release : 23 September 2010
Genre : Action (Slasher) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Vigil Games
Publisher : THQ | Buka Entertainment
Publication Type : RePack
Language : ENG|RUS
Sound language : ENG|RUS
Tablet : not required

System requirements:
Operating system : Windows XP SP3, Vista SP1, Windows 7
Processor : AMD Athlon 64 3800 + 2.4GHz, Intel Pentium 4 530 3.0GHz
Memory : 1 GB (for Windows XP), 2 GB (for Vista / Windows 7)
Video Card : 256MB ATI Radeon X1900 (for Windows XP), ATI Radeon X2000 (for Vista / Windows 7) or NVIDIA GeForce 8800/GeForce GT220
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX ? 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 12.5 GB

Description :
 You - War, and your only task - to bring apocalypse to the human world to sow death and to be a punishment of God on Judgement Day. And then came the hour, you called ... but what is it? Arriving on the ground, sees the devastation war - hell on earth, in the truest sense of the word! Demons and men clutching each other in a death grip and the whole ball of fire and death rolled on you. And in the end kills the hand of the strongest demon 






Year of release : 2012
Genre : Action (Slasher) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Vigil Games
Publisher : THQ | Buka Entertainment
Publication Type : RePack
Language : ENG|RUS
Sound language : ENG|RUS
Tablet : not required

System requirements:
Operating system : Windows XP / Vista / 7
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz or AMD equivalent production
Memory : 2 GB
Video Card : 256 MB VRAM
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX ? 9.0
Free space on hard drive : 6 GB

Description :
 Darksiders 2 - continuation of the action Darksiders: Wrath of War from the studio Vigil Games, the effect of which will unfold simultaneously with the events of the first part. The protagonist of Darksiders 2 is one of the horsemen of the Apocalypse, Death, who is trying to help find the culprit in the War of the premature end of the world. Players will be able to explore new areas, to seek the secret rooms and solving puzzles, and fight with new monsters and various bosses, using a variety of skills and abilities.
